body: The hazard of doing it this way is that now the constructor for `UndefinedTensor` gets invoked at initialization time, which sets you up for a possible static initializer order fiasco. Fortunately the Context does seem to be initialize on use, which prevents us from being hosed here, so I guess it should be OK.
